RelatedSentence: If there still is no functioning government by July as expected , the big three credit rating companies - Moody 's Investors Service , Standard & Poor 's and Fitch Ratings - will likely trim Thailand 's credit outlook to negative , while the country 's sovereign credit ratings are expected to remain unchanged , said Kobsit Silpachai , KBank 's head of capital market research .

If there still is no functioning government by July as expected , the big three credit rating companies - Moody 's Investors Service , Standard & Poor 's and Fitch Ratings - will likely trim Thailand 's credit outlook to negative , while the country 's sovereign credit ratings are expected to remain unchanged , said Kobsit Silpachai , KBank 's head of capital market research .
